definitions.definition: A peninsula and geographic region of Southeast Asia , consisting of the mainland portion, not including islands such as those of Indonesia .
A former French colony in Southeast Asia comprising the peninsula containing Vietnam , Cambodia and Laos ; in full, French Indochina .

main_definition: ( dated ) A peninsula and geographic region of Southeast Asia , consisting of the mainland portion, not including islands such as those of Indonesia .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A former French colony in Southeast Asia comprising the peninsula containing Vietnam , Cambodia and Laos ; in full, French Indochina .
